original: intros commutativity x y Hx Hy Hxy. unfold is_opposite. unfold is_opposite in Hxy. destruct Hxy as [Gx[Gy[HO Hxoy]]]. split. - apply Gx. - split. + apply Gy. + split. * apply HO. * rewrite commutativity. apply HO.
